channel.title: Seeking Feedback on Talk Howdy: Community Platform
channel.description:
Hey y'all! My startup, Talk Howdy, is currently seeking beta testers/feedback on our product and messaging. We'd love to hear your thoughts.
**Elevator pitch:** Talk Howdy is a platform for finding and creating online communities: connect to people with shared interests through small group, virtual meetups.
**Lander copy:** *DISCOVER A COMMUNITY* Communities are a place to communicate about shared interests with certain people. You can create a community for anything - your alumni group, your book club, or your underground society.
*DISCUSS WHAT INTERESTS YOU* Attend virtual meetups with your community using our integrated video platform. Use the discussion board to pose topics for conversation, share your thoughts, and connect with community members.
*ONE STREAMLINED PLATFORM* Say goodbye to the days of using multiple platforms to get connected. Stay in touch with your crew all through your community homepage on Howdy.
Thanks!

item.title: Seeking Feedback on Talk Howdy: Community Platform
item.dc:creator: mkezmkez
item.description:
Hello, I like your idea. Economy is moving towards community related business.

I couldn’t help but think about Facebook groups and Reddit. I’d like to know what you plan to have as a differentiator.

Also, it would be amazing to get a link, since I wasn’t able to find your website when googling.

Cheers!
